chunks.zh: MasterCard 官网活动数据库疑似被脱，请参加过去年 Master 港卡返现活动的及时锁卡报失
chunks.en: MasterCard official website activity database suspected of being leaked. If you participated in the Master Hong Kong card cashback event last year, please lock your card and report the loss in time.

chunks.zh:
去年 MasterCard 有个活动，每张卡内地人民币消费可返 10%，需要在官网输入卡号和 CVV 登记。

https://redemption.mastercard.com/

最近爆出，登记的卡被批量盗刷，一些卡仅在官网登记从来没有使用过，经过交叉验证和推上各网友对账，基本能锁定是官网数据泄漏。

请参与过该活动的网友，记得关注自己账户异动，及时锁卡、报失。
chunks.en:
Last year, MasterCard had an event where each card could get 10% cashback on RMB consumption in mainland China, and you needed to enter your card number and CVV on the official website to register.

https://redemption.mastercard.com/

Recently, it was revealed that registered cards have been stolen in batches. Some cards were only registered on the official website and never used. After cross-validation and reconciliation with netizens, it is basically locked that the official website data was leaked.

Netizens who have participated in this event, please remember to pay attention to your account changes, and lock and report the loss in time.

chunks.zh: 活动报名还要登记 CVV ，绝！
chunks.en: The activity registration also requires CVV registration, unbelievable!

chunks.zh: @explon #3 智商检测字段😂
chunks.en: @explon #3 IQ test field😂

chunks.zh: 我的还没事情，每次总是存刚好的
chunks.en: Nothing has happened to me yet, I always deposit just the right amount.

chunks.zh: 怪不得上个月我的卡被盗刷了
chunks.en: No wonder my card was stolen last month.

chunks.zh: 不是美团被盗刷的吗
chunks.en: Wasn't it stolen by Meituan?

chunks.zh: 汇丰蓝狮子这卡盗刷率本就高，mc 官网盗你的卡，真是做梦没睡醒了。
chunks.en: HSBC's Blue Lion card has a high rate of fraud, it's like a dream if MC official website stole your card.

chunks.zh: 敏感数据不加密吗🐮
chunks.en: Isn't sensitive data encrypted?

chunks.zh: 我没报名也被刷了
chunks.en: I was charged even though I didn't sign up.

chunks.zh: 信用卡这种垃圾技术发生任何问题都不意外
chunks.en: It's not surprising that any problems occur with credit cards, such garbage technology.

chunks.zh: @bccah 哪里提到了“汇丰”“蓝狮子”“官网盗用”，看不懂就做个梦睡醒再看。先 B 为敬～
chunks.en: @bccah Where is 'HSBC', 'Blue Lion', or 'official website theft' mentioned? If you don't understand, have a good dream and wake up to look again. B first to show respect~

chunks.zh: @Wyatt 综合各个渠道，最后汇总到这里。Keeta 之前被脱是另一波。
chunks.en: @Wyatt Integrated from various channels and finally summarized here. The previous Keeta leak was another wave.

chunks.zh: 活动报名要 CVV 这种事情真的完全想不明白为什么
chunks.en: I really can't understand why CVV is required for activity registration.

chunks.zh: @bccah 所以你的意思是汇丰自己盗刷？
chunks.en: @bccah So you mean HSBC itself committed the fraud?

chunks.zh: 昨晚第一次登记。。今天起床就看到这个 🤦 给卡限额了，希望没事
chunks.en: Registered for the first time last night... Woke up and saw this today 🤦 I have set a limit on the card, hope everything is okay.

chunks.zh: 原帖应该是说我发的： https://x.com/taresky/status/1885497661828313466讨论内容交叉的足够多了，是不是这个网站的锅自己判断就是了，原帖和本帖都只是提醒。强行说官网 = 安全，大概率还没毕业。
chunks.en: The original post should be the one I posted: https://x.com/taresky/status/1885497661828313466. There have been enough cross-discussions. Judge for yourself whose fault it is of this website. The original post and this post are just reminders. Forcing the idea that the official website = safe, most likely hasn't graduated yet.

chunks.zh: @taresky 你觉得一定要某方泄露？
chunks.en: @taresky Do you think it must be a leak from one party?

chunks.zh: op 这种垃圾信息搬运工，说不过也就不会 b 了
chunks.en: The OP is such a garbage information porter. If they can't win the argument, they won't "b".

chunks.zh: 只关闭网上交易能避免盗刷吗？锁卡有点麻烦，不及时解开还会变成报失
chunks.en: Can only closing online transactions avoid fraud? Locking the card is a bit troublesome, and if it is not unlocked in time, it will become a report of loss.

chunks.zh: 去年没参加，但是今年参加过的呢？影响有多大
chunks.en: Didn't participate last year, but what about those who participated this year? How big is the impact?

chunks.zh: @docx 卡号加 CVV 走的不是国内那种直连银行的在线交易吧。挂失换卡号比较保险。
chunks.en: @docx The card number and CVV are not used for online transactions that directly connect to banks in China, right? Reporting the loss and changing the card number is safer.
